BIO

I have studied the basics of HTML, CSS and JavaScript and what I need now is the real-world experiece in coding, that this internship will provide. I have also started another course in learning React which will help me grow more as a developer.I am currently working in an unrelated field which leans strongly on soft skills, sure to come in handy in all types of work. These include transferrable skills such as engaging easily with people from different backgrounds, working in a diverse team, and a great deal of patience under pressure. This internship experience is interesting because it would offer me the opportunity to gain practical skills in the field. I'm eager to apply the theories studied at the course, and to work alongside professionals in the domain, learning more about the business along the way. I would appreciate an opportunity to talk further about my application, and am easiest to reach via email or phone.Thank you in advance for reviewing my application and considering how I might contribute to your team.

Sincerely, Monica
